changed_products.title: Anbu Acacia Bed Frame with Washed Walnut Finish - Double or King Size

description: * PLEASE NOTE THE KINGSIZE BED IS NOT AVAILABLE UNTIL 1st DECEMBER 2025 * Transform your bedroom into a cosy, effortlessly stylish haven with the Anbu acacia bed frame, available in double or king size.  Made from solid acacia wood with a stunning walnut finish, this simple yet endlessly elegant bed frame will suit a range of interior styles, from soothing Scandi to vintage-inspired. This natural acacia bed brings a sense of warmth and character to your space, displaying a unique wood grain and organic, curved legs and edges.  The washed walnut finish perfectly balances rustic elements with a sense of sophistication, ideal for comfy, personal spaces like bedrooms.  See below for more pieces in the Anbu collection. The acacia wood bed frame pairs particularly well with the matching acacia chest of drawers or bedside table.

Mendani Mango Wood & Fluted Glass Large Cabinet

description: Bring timeless elegance into your home with our Mendani Mango Wood & Fluted Glass Large Cabinet. This beautifully versatile piece is handmade from pre-treated mango wood and has been finished with walnut stain to highlight the natural beauty of the grain, giving a deeper, richer feel. Fluted glass creates an extra point of interest and lends a sophisticated antique feel to this generously sized cabinet. Use as a freestanding kitchen cupboard to display crockery and house your utensils, place in your living space to display your favourite decorative pieces or even in the bathroom for storing linen and towels in style. Wherever you choose to use it this unique cabinet is guaranteed to add heirloom vibes and essential storage! See below for similar items and the co-ordinating Mendani Low Cabinet…

Lohanda Natural Acacia Wood and Grass Counter Stool

description: Bring comfort and style to your kitchen with the Lohanda Natural Acacia Wood and Grass Counter Stool. Handcrafted from acacia wood and munja grass, the stool benefits from a wealth of natural qualities. The golden warm tones of the neatly woven seat and back perfectly compliment the textured finish of the sandblasted, natural acacia wood frame. Munja grass is sustainable, durable and strong making it ideal for handcrafted furniture. If you love the Lohanda why not browse the black counter chair below?

changed_products.title: Harsha Aged Black Leather Dining Chair

description: Deep, dark and handsome- the Harsha Aged Black Leather Dining Chair… Beautifully upholstered in buffalo leather which has been dyed a deep inky black and featuring vertical stitching along the back, this chair has a striking ribbed finish. The simple forged iron frame creates a sturdy, solid base and an elegant silhouette. With comfort, support and a timeless design the Harsha is equally suited to a stylish dining area or even a modern home office. Also available in other colours, why not see below for details and for more of our dining chairs?

changed_products.title: Anbu Acacia Bedside Table with 2 Drawers - Washed Walnut Finish

description: * PLEASE NOTE THIS ITEM IS CURRENTLY UNAVAILABLE UNTIL 16TH FEBRUARY 2026 * Effortlessly blend style and practicality in your bedroom with the sumptuous Anbu acacia bedside table.
